entity.description: US House of Representatives Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi (CA-12)

text:
@SpeakerPelosi @Morning_Joe @OnlyKathy43210
Jan18 I flew to SFO.Trump had already ordered screenings for #Covid19 at SFO for all incoming flights from China. Meanwhile,Liberals all over the country were participating in women’s marches like one in San Francisco.Mobs of people packed together, not 6 ft apart
